whitepaper.subtitle: Decentralized Real-Time Media Marketplace on TON Blockchain
whitepaper.executiveText: Showpls DAO represents the next evolution in decentralized media acquisition, leveraging the TON blockchain to create a transparent, secure, and globally accessible marketplace for real-time visual content.
whitepaper.missionText: To democratize access to real-time visual information worldwide through blockchain technology and community governance.
whitepaper.visionText: A world where anyone can access authentic, real-time visual content from any location through a decentralized network of providers.
whitepaper.blockchainText: Built on The Open Network for fast, secure, and scalable transactions.
whitepaper.smartContractsText: Automated escrow and payment systems ensuring trust and security.
whitepaper.decentralizedText: Peer-to-peer architecture with no single point of failure.
whitepaper.governanceText: Token holders participate in protocol decisions through decentralized voting mechanisms.
whitepaper.phase1Text: Telegram Web App launch with basic marketplace functionality and TON integration.
whitepaper.phase2Text: Token launch, governance implementation, and community-driven development.
whitepaper.phase3Text: Multi-platform support, advanced features, and worldwide provider network.
whitepaper.fullDocumentText: Download the complete whitepaper for detailed technical specifications, economic model, and roadmap.
